updates.title: Winter Spice Collection
updates.description: Introducing our new winter-themed flavors perfect for the holiday season! Warm up with cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger-infused bubble tea combinations.

updates.title: Enhanced Mixing Mechanics
updates.description: We've improved the mixing system to make it more realistic and satisfying. Now you can see the ingredients blend together in real-time with improved physics.

updates.title: Performance Improvements
updates.description: Fixed several performance issues and improved loading times across all devices. The game now runs smoother than ever!
features: Fixed memory leaks on mobile devices
